title: Geth panic when reporting to ethstats while syncing
body:
#### System information

Geth version: `1.8.0-unstable`
OS & Version: Linux
Commit hash : c786f75389121c29d4380c53a013759254457776

#### Expected behaviour

Geth sync and report no history to ethstats

#### Actual behaviour

Geth fail to report and panic

#### Steps to reproduce the behaviour

# Start with a fresh blockchain
$> rm -rf ~/.ethereum/testnet/geth/chaindata
# Start geth with ethstats option
$> ./build/bin/geth --testnet --fast --ethstats GETH:PASSWORD@127.0.0.1:3000
# Wait for ethstats to do an [history request]

Panic
